translations: 鸟喙；（海龟、鱿鱼等的）喙状嘴；（非正式）（人的）鹰钩鼻；掌权者（尤指法官）；（古代战舰的）冲撞角（beak 的复数）

sentences.sentence: She would show me flowers that look like cats claws, birds beaks, lions ears, doves feet, elks lips, and lizard tails growing right up out of the ground!
sentences.translation: 她指给我看的花朵有些长得像猫爪、像鸟嘴、像狮子耳朵、像鸽子脚、像麋鹿的嘴唇，还有些像从地里长出来的蜥蜴的尾巴！

sentences.sentence: The parrots were given the intellectually demanding task of pulling a snack on a string up to their beaks, using a co-ordinated combination of claws and beak.
sentences.translation: 鹦鹉们被分派了一项对智力要求很高的任务，它们要协调爪子和喙，将一份拴在绳子上的零食拉到它们的喙上。
